title: Upper-Intermediate English 402
headline: Master the passive voice and relative clauses in this free online English course that also enriches your vocabulary.
description: This English course explains how to use the passive voice in the future tense and covers using modal verbs in statements, negatives, and questions. We also explore the use of relative pronouns and adverbs in relative clauses. In addition, you will acquire useful vocabulary related to personal home preferences and house-hunting. Enroll in this hands-on course to learn English grammar and build confidence in this global language.
courseDescription:
Buying, selling, or renting a home is a big decision. Even though finding your perfect home can be a rewarding experience, the process of discovering it can be daunting and stressful. This English course introduces you to important vocabulary related to your personal preferences when searching for a new home.

The grammar section shows you how to use your newfound words and phrases practically. We explain how to use 'will be' and 'by' phrases with passive voice in the future tense. The course also outlines modal verbs in the passive voice and demonstrates how to use them when asking questions and forming statements. Finally, we show you how to include extra information in sentences using relative clauses and how to use relative pronouns and adverbs to avoid repeating words when forming statements.

This course allows you to explore and complete activities designed to enhance your English reading, listening, and speaking skills. In addition, you will find a downloadable task in our 'Resources' section that will help you improve your writing skills. Enroll today to boost your confidence and take another step towards becoming more proficient in English.
